item.title: Best Fuji Lens for Street Photography - 24mm F8 Body Cap Review
item.description: Best Fuji Lens for Street Photography - 24mm F8 Body Cap Review Human are always contradictory: we say we’d like to save the environment, while we generate lots of waste each day; We say we’d like to be healthy, while living in a unhealthy way of eating and working; We say we’d like to have a young heart, while becoming more and more realistic in a materialistic worldâ€¦even when I escaped to the lonely island of street photography, there is also a contradiction: photographers say street photography is all about content while arguing about the image quality of gears.
